name: ShopStudioMicrosoftAdvertisingCloud

infos.name: Microsoft Advertising
infos.description:
Neu für Shopbetreiber: Wir richten dein professionelles Tracking ein: https://sh.studio/shopware-tracking-setup-de


Microsoft Advertising Integration für datengetriebene Shops. Messe mit Hilfe von präzisem Tracking für Produkte, Bestellung und mehr wie profitabel deine Anzeigen sind.


Einige weitere interessante Links

➤ Uptime-Monitoring & Status-Check: https://status.cloud.shop-studio.io
➤ Du suchst eine Shopware-Agentur für deinen Online-Shop? Kontaktiere uns: https://sh.studio/work-with-us-de
➤ Wenn du technischen Support brauchst, dann eröffne ein Support-Ticket: https://account.shopware.com
infos.installationManual:
Du kannst hier die Dokumentation finden: https://docs.shop-studio.io/de/erweiterungen/microsoft-advertising

Wenn du Fragen hast oder Hilfe benötigst, dann schreib uns gerne ein Support-Ticket in deinem Shopware Account unter account.shopware.com
infos.shortDescription: Microsoft Advertising Integration für datengetriebene Shops. Messe mit Hilfe von präzisem Tracking für Produkte, Bestellung und mehr wie profitabel deine Anzeigen sind.

infos.name: Microsoft Advertising
infos.description:
Microsoft Advertising integration for data-driven stores. Measure how profitable your campaign and ads are with precise tracking for products, checkout, orders and more.


Some more interesting links

➤ Uptime monitoring & status check: https://status.cloud.shop-studio.io/
➤ Are you looking for a Shopware agency for your online shop? Then contact us: https://sh.studio/work-with-us-en
➤ If you need technical support, open a support ticket: https://account.shopware.com
infos.installationManual:
You can find the documentation here: https://docs.shop-studio.io/shopware/extensions/microsoft-advertising

If you have any questions or need help, feel free to write us a support ticket in your Shopware account at account.shopware.com
infos.shortDescription: Microsoft Advertising integration for data-driven stores. Measure how profitable your campaign and ads are with precise tracking for products, checkout, orders and more.

changelog.text: - Fix: Fixed compatibility with "disable cookie consent" setting
- Improvement: Changed cookie expiration to 10 years
- Fix: Recompiled JS to compatibility with Shopware 6.4.9.0 or higher

- Fix: Fixed add to cart event in some cases (race condition)

- Fix: Fixed remove from cart event in some cases (race condition)

- Fix: Fixed add to cart JS error on double clicks (race condition)
- Fix: Dynamic remarketing for purchase events works again
